name: earth
title: Earth
description: The third planet from the Sun and the only known place in the universe to support life.

name: jupiter
title: Jupiter
description: The largest planet in the Solar System, known for its Great Red Spot and many moons.

name: mars
title: Mars
description: The fourth planet from the Sun, often called the Red Planet due to its iron oxide-rich surface.

name: mercury
title: Mercury
description: The smallest planet in the Solar System and the closest to the Sun.

name: moon
title: Moon
description: Earth’s only natural satellite, influencing tides and night-time illumination.

name: neptune
title: Neptune
description: The eighth planet from the Sun, known for its deep blue color and strong winds.

name: pluto
title: Pluto
description: A dwarf planet in the Kuiper Belt, once considered the ninth planet of the Solar System.

name: saturn
title: Saturn
description: The second-largest planet, famous for its stunning ring system.

name: sun
title: Sun
description: The star at the center of our Solar System, providing energy for all life on Earth.

name: uranus
title: Uranus
description: The seventh planet from the Sun, unique for its tilted rotation axis.

name: venus
title: Venus
description: The second planet from the Sun, often called Earth’s twin due to its similar size but extreme conditions.
